mods.abstract: Female adult, Turkish woman, papier-mache dolls, face covered with fabric, molded and painted features, purple full sized pants, cream color jacket with braid trimming, back of jacket cover the hip and extend to ankle, loosely woven striped apron, sash with beads and sequins, black wig with braids, hair cap with beads and sequins, all, hand and machine-madeAccompanying information describes as a gift of Miss Norris McClellan.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
mods.note: Woman in blue costume with umbrella, Whirling Dervish dressed in white, Seated musician playing reed instrument, Veiled woman dressed in purple with parasol, Woman with long braids dressed in purple skirt

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
